stories.text: I'm no manager neither senior executive but curious for you that have those title, in large organization there is always some inefficiency, learned helplessness, normalization of deviance, how do you tackle that situation ?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you design a responsive organization in large company?
Web fonts, boy, I don't know
Ask HN: What is your favorite blog from a layout/format perspective?

stories.text:
Hi HN. I’m considering taking HRT to present as female. I’ve had gender dysphoria since at least puberty. The idea of transitioning seems fun to me and I wonder if it might help me enjoy life more.

I’m asking HN as it tends to be a curious, yet skeptical and sometimes rigorous community.

My question is: how can I know if this is the right decision for me? Are there good ways of “prototyping” this decision? Is there any great scientific research that is good at predicting outcomes (i.e. whether transitioning improves quality of life or not)?

Thanks so much. Anonymous account for privacy, but a long time poster.
stories.title: Ask HN: Considering Transitioning Gender
Amazon plans to launch its first internet satellites in late 2022
Boeing gets FCC approval for 147-satellite constellation
